posts.post_title: Graded Obak & Others 4th of July Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andrew
13 Obaks
1 Zeenut
a few hard to find non-sports
other items of interest

SOLD - Kuhn, Rodgers, Zeenut Rowland

Money orders and personal checks preferred, Paypal add 2.9%.  All cards will be shipped securely via USPS with Delivery Confirmation for $4.99, insurance is an extra $2.30.

Many successful transactions on various collector boards.

 A password is NOT needed for the "For Sale" album
